tls:text.tls:line: Not knowing is not inconsistent with being a gentleman;

sense.def: lack of knowledge of a particular point

tls:text.tls:line: Not knowing is not inconsistent with being a gentleman;
Not knowing is not inconsistent with being a gentleman;

sense.def: be consistent with, not be incompatible with

tls:text.tls:line: These are true words.

sense.def: be reliably true, be trustworthy; be certainly the case

tls:text.tls:line: knowing does not make a petty man any less so;
knowing does not make a petty man any less so;

sense.def: be consistent with, not diminish NPab-hood in any way

tls:text.tls:line: that the artisan is incapable of it does not detract from his skill;

sense.def: be consistent with, not be incompatible with

tls:text.tls:line: that the gentleman does not know it does not detract from his good governing.

sense.def: be consistent with, not be incompatible with

tls:text.tls:line: An old saying has it: "

tls:text.tls:line: The farmer and the tradesman, the artisan and the official do not change places.
The farmer and the tradesman, the artisan and the official do not change places.

sense.def: (itinerant) trader; generally: person engaged in trading

tls:text.tls:line: The farmer and the tradesman, the artisan and the official do not change places.

sense.def: specialised worker; craftsman, artisan; sometimes specifically: musician
